DOC.brief_summary: To investigate mucosal microbiome human gastric intestinal etaplasia duodenal tissue .
DOC.brief_title: Mucosal Microbiome Human Gastric Intestinal Metaplasia Duodenal Tissue .
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule gastroendoscopy examination Aged 18 80 year old Antibiotic , probiotic prebiotic usage within 2months , gastric inhibitor usage within 1 month Esophageal , gastric duodenal cancer malignancy History upper GI tract surgery Coagulopathy bleeding disorder Allergy fluorescein sodium Pregnant breastfeeding ( female ) Impaired renal function
